commands.command: nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(http* or ssl*) and not (broadcast or dos or external or http-slowloris* or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_http_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_http_nmap.xml" {address}
curl -sik {scheme}://{address}:{port}/ -m 10 -o "{scandir}/{port}_http_index.html"
curl -sik {scheme}://{address}:{port}/robots.txt -m 10 -o "{scandir}/{port}_http_robots.tx"
whatweb --color=never --no-errors -a 3 -v {scheme}://{address}:{port} | tee "{scandir}/{port}_http_whatweb.txt"
gobuster -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/Web-Content/common.txt -t 10 -u {scheme}://{address}:{port} -e -s "200,204,301,302,307,403,500" -o "{scandir}/{port}_http_gobuster_common.txt"
nikto -ask=no -h {scheme}://{address}:{port}{nikto_ssl} -o "{scandir}/{port}_http_nikto.txt"

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(smtp*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_smtp_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_smtp_nmap.xml" {address}
smtp-user-enum -M VRFY -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/top-usernames-shortlist.txt -t {address} -p {port} | tee "{scandir}/{port}_smtp_user-enum.txt"

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(pop3*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_pop3_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_pop3_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(imap*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_imap_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_imap_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(ftp*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_ftp_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_ftp_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(nbstat or smb*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" --script-args=unsafe=1 -oN "{scandir}/{port}_smb_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_smb_nmap.xml" {address}
enum4linux -a -M -l -d {address} | tee "{scandir}/{port}_smb_enum4linux.txt"
nbtscan -rvh {address} | tee "{scandir}/{port}_smb_nbtscan.txt"

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(ms-sql*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" --script-args=mssql.instance-port={port},smsql.username-sa,mssql.password-sa -oN "{scandir}/{port}_mssql_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_mssql_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(mysql*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_mysql_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_mysql_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(oracle*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_oracle_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_oracle_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(rpcinfo or nfs*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_nfs_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_nfs_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(snmp*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_snmp_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_snmp_nmap.xml" {address}
onesixtyone -c /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/SNMP/common-snmp-community-strings.txt -dd -o "{scandir}/{port}_snmp_onesixtyone.txt" {address}
snmpwalk -c public -v 1 {address} | tee "{scandir}/{port}_snmp_snmpwalk.txt"

nmap -vv --reason -Pn -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(rdp*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" -oN "{scandir}/{port}_rdp_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_rdp_nmap.xml" {address}

nmap -vv --reason -Pn -sV {nmap_extra} -p {port} --script="(vnc* or realvnc*) and not (brute or broadcast or dos or external or fuzzer)" --script-args=unsafe=1 -oN "{scandir}/{port}_vnc_nmap.txt" -oX "{scandir}/{port}_vnc_nmap.xml" {address}
